name: Fight of Animals
description:
Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more
are now become Fighters!!
Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!!
Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!
Players are able to fight through arcade mode become the King of Animals!
also allows players to challenge people around the globe online!
Only four buttons required!!
In Fight of Animals, the controls are much easier than most of modern fighting games,
Afraid no more!! with our "easy combo" system and simple direction+skill button control,
allows players perform awesome moves even
if you have NEVER PLAY ANY FIGHTING GAME BEFORE!!

With highly synchronized online matching feature, Players are allowed to fight with others from web, Or simply
invite your friends from your Steam friend list and see who is a better fighter!
Each animal (Character) all comes with unique design moves and super!
Of curse, each awesome moves all have their advantage and weak spot, avoid smashing the same move
and find the right timing to smash your opponent!
